dialogue.htmlContent: Wanting to talk with Nyan for a little while, you turn to face her and give her a smile. Shuffling about on the spot, the cat-girl's cheeks start to redden, and she shyly mumbles, [nyan.speechNoEffects(W-What is it, [pc.name]?)]

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong('NYAN_NOVELS')>-1)

Knowing that your girlfriend likes talking about books, you ask her about the romance novels she's bene reading lately.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, well, I'm re-reading the 'Paradise' t-trilogy again,)] she says, before producing a book from a nearby shelf and showing it to you. Shuffling her feet, the cat-girl continues, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-It's the series about a c-cat-girl finding love in D-Dominion. It's by my f-favourite author, and I-I think that I've read it about t-ten times already...)]

Continuing to question Nyan about these books, you're reminded of the fact that she's quite the bibliophile, and while she's happy to read books of any genre, she has a particular love for romance novels. From what she says, it sounds as though she's read almost everything ever published in this genre, and has a signed copy of every book ever written by her favourite author.

From your conversation with Nyan, you're reminded that [style.italicsExcellent(her favourite book is called 'One Night in June')].

#ELSE

Curious to find out more about the sort of books your girlfriend likes reading, you ask Nyan about the romance novel she showed you before.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, you mean 'Paradise Found?'?)] she asks, holding up the book in question. Shuffling her feet, the cat-girl continues, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-It's the final book in a t-trilogy about a c-cat-girl finding love in D-Dominion. It's by my f-favourite author...)]

Continuing to question Nyan about these books, you soon discover that she's quite the bibliophile, and while she's happy to read books of any genre, she has a particular love for romance novels. From what she says, it sounds as though she's read almost everything ever published in this genre, and has a signed copy of every book ever written by her favourite author.

From your conversation with Nyan, you learn that [style.italicsExcellent(her favourite book is called 'One Night in June')].

#ENDIF

In her excitement at being able to talk with you about this topic, Nyan's stutter almost completely disappears. Encouraged by this sign, you happily continue talking with your girlfriend about books, and before you know it, almost an hour has passed by.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong('NYAN_WORK')>-1)

Deciding that it would be a good idea to find out how how Nyan's work has been going lately, you ask her how she's coping with being this store's owner and manager.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, well, I try my best, but I'm still not v-very good at dealing with customers,)] Nyan admits once again. Looking down at the floor and shuffling her feet, she continues, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I asked all the staff the other d-day if they'd like me to get m-more involved on the shop floor, b-but they all said that I can s-stick to doing the finances and ordering s-stock. They know how n-nervous I get around people, and they're a-all so considerate...)]

Curious to hear more about Nyan's role in her business, you continue talking with her about this topic for quite some time. While most of what she tells you is relatively mundane, she again reveals a hint at how she came to own this business, and says how she given it by someone close to her. Not wanting to reveal much more than that, however, the nervous cat-girl quickly shifts the topic and starts talking about her long work-hours, and how at some point in the future she'd like to start taking weekends off.

From your conversation with Nyan, you're reminded that [style.italicsExcellent(her store was called 'Golden Threads' before she took it over)].

#ELSE

As it clearly plays such an important role in her life, you decide to ask Nyan about her work and how she copes with being this store's owner and manager.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, well, I try my best, but I'm really not v-very good at dealing with customers,)] Nyan admits. Looking down at the floor and shuffling her feet, she continues, [nyan.speechNoEffects(A-All of my staff are s-super nice and considerate, s-so they don't object to me j-just being in charge of finances and ordering s-stock.)]

Curious to hear more about Nyan's role in her business, you continue talking with her about this topic for quite some time. While most of what she tells you is relatively mundane, she does reveal a hint at how she came to own this business, and lets slip that she was given it by someone close to her. Not wanting to say much more than that, however, the nervous cat-girl quickly shifts the topic and starts talking about her long work-hours, and how at some point in the future she'd like to start taking weekends off.

From your conversation with Nyan, you learn that [style.italicsExcellent(her store was called 'Golden Threads' before she took it over)].

#ENDIF

Soon enough, Nyan is enthusiastically talking about the finer details of her work, and you can't help but notice how her stutter almost completely disappears. Encouraged by this sign, you happily continue talking with your girlfriend about her store, and before you know it, almost an hour has passed by.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong('NYAN_HOBBIES')>-1)

Wanting to once again talk about a topic which she'll surely enjoy, you ask your girlfriend about her old hobbies of fashion and baking again.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, well, I still d-don't really have any time in w-which to enjoy fashion or baking,)] she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(A-And anyway, I-I wouldn't feel comfortable w-wearing anything other t-than what I've got on right now...)]

Questioning Nyan further, you once again end up talking about how her interest in fashion led her to her first job as a seamstress, and although she enjoyed that work, she eventually gave it up in order to assume her current role as owner and manager of this store. It was due to this change in career, and the subsequent longer work-hours which she's taken on, that she now doesn't have as much free time as she used to. Regretting the fact that she only has time for keeping up with fashion trends directly related to her work, your girlfriend says that she'd like to start taking weekends off at some point.

From your conversation with Nyan, you're reminded that [style.italicsExcellent(she used to bake pastries for her mum every morning)].

#ELSE

Deciding that it would be a good idea to talk about a topic which she'll surely enjoy, you ask your girlfriend if she has any hobbies other than reading books.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(W-Well, I do like f-fashion, but I don't ever feel c-comfortable wearing anything other than m-my uniform,)] she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I also like baking, but I don't r-really get much time to d-do that these days...)]

Questioning Nyan further, you soon discover that her interest in fashion led her to her first job as a seamstress, and although she enjoyed that work, she eventually gave it up in order to assume her current role as owner and manager of this store. It was due to this change in career, and the subsequent longer work-hours which she's taken on, that she now doesn't have as much free time as she used to, and so can no longer pursue her other hobby of baking. Regretting the fact that she also no longer has the time to spare in which to keep up with any fashion trends not directly related to her work, your girlfriend says that she'd like to start taking weekends off at some point.

From your conversation with Nyan, you learn that [style.italicsExcellent(she used to bake pastries for her mum every morning)].

#ENDIF

Asking questions about her favourite dresses and cakes, you've soon got Nyan enthusiastically talking about her old hobbies, and you can't help but notice how her stutter almost completely disappears. Encouraged by this sign, you happily continue talking with your girlfriend about fashion and baking, and before you know it, almost an hour has passed by.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().getSavedLong('NYAN_HOME')>-1)

Wanting to talk with Nyan about her family and her life here in Dominion, you begin by asking her if she's recently heard from her mother.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, well, I-I get regular l-letters from her,)] she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(B-But s-she's still really busy these days, and she d-doesn't have time t-to come back to Dominion at the m-moment...)]

Switching to talk about the recent events in Nyan's life, you again hear about how she lives in an apartment very close to the Shopping Arcade, and that while she loves going out into the countryside, her work doesn't give her enough time in which to do so these days. Although she doesn't reveal too much, Nyan again briefly mentions how her mum is a very important businesswoman who travels all over Lilith's Realm to conduct her work. Her father, on the other hand, hasn't ever been involved in Nyan's life, and while she does have siblings elsewhere in the Realm, it's only her mother who she has a real relationship with.

From your conversation with Nyan, you're reminded that [style.italicsExcellent(fields of daisies were her favourite sight when visiting the countryside)].

#ELSE

Wanting to find out more about Nyan's earlier life, you ask her if she's always lived in Dominion, and if she has family here in the city.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(Y-Yes, I've always lived here, a-although I used to often v-visit the countryside with m-my mum,)] she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(She's the only f-family I have here, although s-she's really busy these days, and I-I haven't seen her in a while...)]

Continuing to question Nyan further on this topic, you discover that she lives in an apartment very close to the Shopping Arcade, and that while she loves going out into the countryside, her work doesn't give her enough time in which to do so these days. You also find out some details about her family, and although Nyan doesn't reveal too much, she does say how her mum is a very important businesswoman who travels all over Lilith's Realm to conduct her work. Her father, on the other hand, hasn't ever been involved in Nyan's life, and while she does have siblings elsewhere in the Realm, it's only her mother who she has a real relationship with.

From your conversation with Nyan, you learn that [style.italicsExcellent(fields of daisies were her favourite sight when visiting the countryside)].

#ENDIF

By encouraging Nyan to talk about her life in Dominion, as well as about her family, you soon manage to get her enthusiastically engaged in conversation, and you can't help but notice how her stutter almost completely disappears. Happy to hear this, you continue talking with your girlfriend, and before you know it, almost an hour has passed by.

Glancing down at her watch and seeing the time, Nyan lets out a little eek and declares, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh no! I've still got so much work to do t-today! Sorry, [pc.name], but I think we'll h-have to continue this topic another time... I-I really enjoyed talking with you, though!)]

With no more time in which to talk today, Nyan starts shyly shuffling her feet and waiting to hear what it is you'll ask of her next...

Thinking that Nyan could use a compliment to help boost her confidence, but not wanting to rush into it and potentially give her a panic attack, you first ask her some innocent questions about the clothing she has on offer. As you see her nervous expression start to give way into a smile, you decide that the time's right to say what's on your mind.
[pc.speech(You know, you really do have beautiful eyes,)] you say, smiling at your pretty girlfriend. [pc.speech(They're such a gorgeous shade of blue.)]
[pc.speech(Your hair looks really good today,)] you say, smiling at your pretty girlfriend. [pc.speech(I really love what you do with it.)]
[pc.speech(I really love your outfit,)] you say, smiling at your pretty girlfriend. [pc.speech(That blouse suits you so well.)]

The cute cat-girl instantly blushes, and before she can stop herself, a happy little giggle escapes from her mouth. Tilting her head down a little, she looks up at you with her big, blue eyes, and stammers, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-Thank you, [pc.name]! Y-You're so nice to me...)]

As you've grown closer to Nyan since becoming her [pc.girlfriend], you've noticed that she's started relaxing more when in your presence. You've also noticed that she sometimes takes glances at your body when she thinks you're not looking, and so, confident that she's comfortable enough around you by now, you decide to flirt with her a little.

Playfully teasing her over the subject of which lingerie she likes the most, you soon manage to get the blushing cat-girl smiling and giggling. Light-heartedly smacking you on the [pc.arm], she exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]! ~Hehe!~ Stop it!)]

Playfully encouraging her to talk about the more risqué parts of her romance novels, you soon manage to get Nyan giggling and blushing. Light-heartedly smacking you on the [pc.arm], she shouts, [nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]! ~Hehe!~ Y-You're so naughty!)]

In a light-hearted manner, you start teasing Nyan by asking her what sort of naughty things she'd like to get up to one you've been dating for long enough. It only takes a moment before you've got the blushing cat-girl giggling and playfully smacking you on the [pc.arm] as she cries out, [nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]! ~Hehe!~ I-I'm not as dirty-minded as you!)]
You carry on having some fun with your shy girlfriend for a little while, before eventually winding it down and wondering what to ask of her next...

From the look of adoration in her big, [nyan.eyeColour] eyes, you can tell that Nyan is desperate to have some physical contact with you. Knowing exactly what this cute cat-girl deserves, you reach up and give the top of her head a gentle pat.

Leaning into your [pc.hand], the cat-girl lets out a soft purr, and as you continue gently patting and stroking her head, she sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(~Mmm!~ T-That feels nice... D-Do my ears too...)]

Letting out a delighted purr and tilting her head into your [pc.hand], the cat-girl bites her lip and sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(K-Keep going... ~Mmm!~ I-If you'd like, y-you could scratch my ears as well...)]

Sighing and purring in delight, the cat-girl lets her eyelids droop down as she happily sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-That's nice... ~Mmm!~ M-My ears feel good to scratch too, i-if you'd like to try it...)]

Doing as Nyan suggests, you move your [pc.fingers+] over to stroke her soft, [nyan.earColour]-furred ears, which causes her to let out another series of soft purrs and moans. Happily rubbing her head into your [pc.hand], the shy cat-girl encourages you to keep on patting her, until eventually, after more than ten minutes have passed, she pulls back and meekly thanks you for giving her some loving attention.

As you walk around the storeroom, you see Nyan constantly staring at you with a hungry glint in her eye. She's obviously thinking the same thing as you, so as you reach the end of the aisle, you turn towards the delicate cat-girl and [pc.step] towards her.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(Yes, [pc.name]?)] Nyan sighs, looking longingly into your eyes. [nyan.speechNoEffects(What is it? Did you wan- ~Mmmm!~)]

Unable to resist any longer, you reach up and take hold of Nyan's head, before leaning in and pressing your lips against hers. Whatever question she was about to ask is instantly forgotten, and as her little clipboard clatters to the floor, she closes her eyes and tilts her head to one side. Letting out a series of soft, muffled moans, she slightly parts her soft, plump lips, allowing you to slide your tongue into her mouth.

[nyan.speechNoEffects([pc.Name]?)] Nyan asks, letting out a little sigh as she looks longingly into your eyes. [nyan.speechNoEffects(Did you wan- ~Mmmm!~)]

Unable to resist any longer, you reach up and take hold of Nyan's head, before leaning in and pressing your lips against hers. Whatever question she was about to ask is instantly forgotten, and as her little clipboard clatters to the floor, she closes her eyes and tilts her head to one side. Letting out a series of soft, muffled moans, she slightly parts her soft, plump lips, allowing you to slide your tongue into her mouth.

You continue kissing one another for several minutes, but although Nyan seems extremely happy with the current situation, she doesn't seem to want to take it any further at the moment. Finally, you both break off the kiss, before stepping back and smiling at one another.

Having by now spent a decent amount of time getting to know one another, you feel as though Nyan might be ready to go out on a walk with you, and so you openly suggest this idea to her.

[nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh, erm, a-a walk?)] she replies, but after nervously rubbing her slender, padded fingers together for a moment, she looks into your eyes and bravely declares, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Ok! I-It would be n-nice to stretch my legs, a-and also to spend some more t-time with you...)]

Happy to hear your girlfriend's positive reply, you accompany her to the door of the storeroom and then out across the shop floor. Within minutes the two of you are walking down the wide, marble-floored walkways of the Arcade, but as you draw close to the exit, your nervous girlfriend stutters, [nyan.speechNoEffects(O-Oh, I d-don't really want to g-go out there. L-Let's stay in the Arcade, o-ok?)]

Agreeing to do as she asks, you turn and begin to lead the shy cat-girl in a loop around the Arcade. Talking to one another while you [pc.walk], you pass by 'Ralph's Snacks' and 'Succubi's Secrets' without incident, but as you approach the gift-store, 'Dream Lover', Nyan claps her slender hands together in excitement and reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh, t-that's Ashley's store! I-I've bought quite a few romantic n-novels from there. Ashley's really nice to me, a-although I've seen her shout at some other p-people before...)]

Continuing on past Ashley's store, you approach Nyan's Clothing Emporium, but your girlfriend doesn't seem ready to end the walk just yet, and asks, [nyan.speechNoEffects(C-Can we walk around the other side too? I-I'm having fun...)]

Wanting to get out of the storeroom and spend some time with Nyan out in the Arcade, you ask her if she'd like to go out for a walk. Happily smiling at you, your cute girlfriend eagerly replies, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I'd like that, [pc.name]! Come on, let's g-go!)]

Happy to hear the cat-girl's positive reply, you accompany her to the door of the storeroom and then out across the shop floor. Within minutes the two of you are walking down the wide, marble-floored walkways of the Arcade, talking with one another about everything from how Nyan's day is going to the contents on display in the shop windows.

Travelling in a circuitous route around the entire Arcade, you end up passing by Ashley's shop, 'Dream Lover'. Stopping to look through the window, Nyan sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(It doesn't look as though A-Ashley has any new books for sale. Oh well...)]

Wanting to cheer up your girlfriend, you say how there's bound to be a new romance novel released soon. You're quickly rewarded for your thoughtfulness by the heart-warming sight of the cat-girl's smile, as well as by her response, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thanks, [pc.name], y-you're the best...)]

Travelling in a circuitous route around the entire Arcade, you end up passing by the antiques shop. Briefly stopping to look through the window, Nyan asks, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I wonder how this place manages to stay open? There's b-barely ever any customers inside...)]

[pc.Stepping] up beside your girlfriend, you respond by saying that the store must compensate for their limited sales by making a good profit off of every item they sell. Letting out an understanding 'ah', Nyan turns towards you and cheerily says, [nyan.speechNoEffects(You must be right, [pc.name]. T-The stuff they sell seems to be really expensive, so that's how they d-do it...)]

Travelling in a circuitous route around the entire Arcade, you end up passing by the dark, shut-up beauty salon, 'Succubi's Secrets'. Glancing over at the uninviting façade, your girlfriend states, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Y-You know, that place is actually open, d-despite its looks...)]

Continuing to walk past the gloomy-looking salon, you ask Nyan if she's ever been in there before. Nervously fidgeting with her slender, padded fingers, she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Y-Yes, my mum goes there all the t-time when she's in town. I-I went along with her once, but I didn't really enjoy it, s-so I've never gone back...)]

With Nyan by your side, you travel around the entire Arcade in a circuitous route, and end up passing by the gym, 'Pix's Playground'. Looking over at the huge, glass-panelled frontage, your girlfriend reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(The owner of that place is really f-friendly. She keeps on trying to get me t-to join her gym whenever I see her, but I-I really don't have time for it...)]

Taking this opportunity to ask Nyan her opinion on physical exercise and sports, you're given the response, [nyan.speechNoEffects(W-Well, I do yoga every day at home... Oh, I also used to be a member of a swimming club, b-but I was never really good at it and gave it up a long time ago...)]

With Nyan by your side, you travel around the entire Arcade in a circuitous route, and end up passing by the shop, 'Ralph's Snacks'. Frowning at the shop as you pass, your girlfriend declares, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I don't trust Ralph; I've only been in there a couple of times to buy a snack, and b-both times he was really overbearing and creepy.)]

Looking over at the shop, you ask Nyan where she goes to buy snacks, if not to there. Swishing her fluffy tail around behind her, she proudly states, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I always make my own p-packed lunches now, so I don't need to go shopping anywhere for snacks. I-I can eat a lot healthier by bringing my own food to work as well...)]

With Nyan by your side, you travel around the entire Arcade in a circuitous route, and end up passing by the restaurant, 'The Oaken Glade'. Gazing longingly at the arcane illusion of a summer-time forest glade, your girlfriend wistfully sighs, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I've got a lot of g-good memories of being here with mum...)]

Asking Nyan to tell you more, you listen as she goes on to reveal, [nyan.speechNoEffects(M-My mum helped to fund the head chef to get this place set up. W-We'd always get given the same table near the back of the r-restaurant...)]

With Nyan by your side, you travel around the entire Arcade in a circuitous route, and end up passing by the shop, 'Arcane Arts'. Glancing through the windows and taking a brief look at the store's dimly-lit interior, Nyan shudders and moves a little closer to you, before gossiping, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I heard that the wolf-girl who runs that place is an ex-slave, you know...)]

Asking the cat-girl for more information, you listen as she nervously reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Oh, well, d-don't tell anyone that I told you this, b-but one of my mum's Enforcer friends told us once that the wolf-girl was a-arrested for sexually assaulting someone. A-After that, more victims of hers came forwards, a-and she ended up being sentenced to eight years as a slave. I suppose she must have c-changed her ways, seeing as she was given a license to o-open her own business...)]
As you continue on your walk through the Arcade, you wonder whether to make a move on Nyan, or to simply keep on talking to her until you arrive back at her store...

Wanting to simply enjoy your time with Nyan, you decide against making a move on her and just continue to [pc.walk] by her side through the Arcade. In this manner, the two of you soon find yourselves returning to where you began, and after a brief walk through her shop's floor, you return to the quiet of her storeroom.

Turning to smile at you, the cute cat-girl curls her tail around to playfully stroke it and says, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thank you for the w-walk, [pc.name]. I had a lot of fun...)]

Returning both your girlfriend's smile and sentiments, you wonder what to ask of her next...

Sensing that your shy girlfriend is relaxed and comfortable enough to allow you to do so, you reach down and take hold of her hand. Despite profusely blushing at this overt display of affection, Nyan squeezes her slender, padded fingers around your [pc.hand] and moves closer so as to walk right beside you. Looking over at her, you see her cat-like ears twitching in excitement, and as her fluffy tail curls up behind her, she quietly mutters, [nyan.speechNoEffects(I-I really like this...)]

Smiling at her confession, you continue holding Nyan's delicate, feminine hand all the way back to where your walk began. Not letting go, your girlfriend then allows you to lead the way as you cross the shop's busy floor, and only once the two of you are back in the quiet of the storeroom does she release her grip.

Turning to smile at you, and with her cheeks still flushed red, the cute cat-girl curls her tail around to playfully stroke it and says, [nyan.speechNoEffects(Thank you for the w-walk, [pc.name]. I really like h-holding hands like that...)]

Returning both your girlfriend's smile and sentiments, you wonder what to ask of her next...

Leading Nyan over to one side of the path, you take hold of her [nyan.hips+] and pull her up against you. Sensing what it is you're about to do, your shy girlfriend blushes and stammers, [nyan.speechNoEffects(R-Right here i-in public? [pc.Name]... I...)]

Despite her words, Nyan happily leans into you, before gently tilting her head to one side and slightly parting her [nyan.lips+]. With her hot breath falling on your face, and the faint scent of her perfume in the air, you lean forwards and press your [pc.lips] against hers. Almost instantly, you feel Nyan's arms wrap around your back, and she starts letting out little muffled moans as you slide your [pc.tongue+] into her mouth.

Although she'd initially expressed alarm at kissing in public, your girlfriend quickly loses herself in the moment, and continues to passionately return your kiss for quite some time. Eventually, however, she pulls back to breathe, at which point she suddenly seems to recall where she is, and with her cheeks flushing bright red, she buries her face in your shoulder and exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(L-Let's go back now!)]

Smiling at her sudden turn of shyness, you allow Nyan to hold onto you and hide her face in your chest as you somewhat-awkwardly [pc.walk] all the way back to her store. Still not letting go, your girlfriend tightly wraps her fluffy tail around your [pc.leg] as you cross the shop's busy floor, and only once the two of you are back in the quiet of the storeroom does she release her grip.

Turning to shyly smile at you, and with her cheeks still flushed bright red, the cute cat-girl curls her tail around to playfully stroke it and stutters, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-Thank you for the w-walk, [pc.name]. I-It was fun, but that kiss in p-public was so embarrassing...)]

Returning your girlfriend's smile, you wonder what to ask of her next...

More than happy to do as she asks, you accompany Nyan around the other half of the Shopping Arcade. As you continue to talk with one another, you realise that the cat-girl's stutter is slightly less pronounced than it usually is, and what's more, with every step she takes, she moves closer and closer towards your side.

Having by now travelled around most of the Arcade, the two of you soon find yourselves approaching the corner near to where Nyan's store is located. At this moment, your girlfriend suddenly lets out an excited gasp and exclaims, [nyan.speechNoEffects(That's my favourite restaurant! L-Look, [pc.name]!)]

Following Nyan over to stand in front of this restaurant, you see that the name 'The Oaken Glade' is proudly written in flowing gold lettering above its front door. The establishment's large windows allow the two of you to look in on an incredible scene; the vast interior has been manipulated by some form of arcane-powered illusion, making it appear as though the restaurant is a portal directly into the middle of a summer-time forest clearing. #IF(game.isDayTime()) Bright sunlight shines down through the leaves of the huge oak trees which border this clearing, covering the tables and chairs in a soft, dappled-green glow. #ELSEIF(game.getCurrentDayPeriod()==DAY_PERIOD_NIGHT) Glowing lanterns have been hung from the branches of the huge oak trees which border this clearing, casting the tables and chairs in a soft, orange glow. #ENDIF

[nyan.speechNoEffects(I-Isn't it amazing? I've been in there a few times with my mum, but she's been so busy that she h-hasn't been able to visit for a while,)] Nyan sighs, before giving you a big smile and revealing, [nyan.speechNoEffects(T-The owner said that there's always a t-table reserved for me, but I d-don't feel comfortable going there a-alone... A-Anyway, let's go back now; m-my staff are probably wondering where I am...)]

Making a mental note of the fact that Nyan likes this restaurant, as well as the fact that there's no need for her to book a reservation in order to get a table, you do as she suggests and accompany her back towards her store...

It only takes a few minutes before the two of you have arrived back at Nyan's Clothing Emporium, and after weaving your way through the busy crowds, your girlfriend once again leads you back into the quiet storeroom. Turning to face you, she gives you another of her cute smiles, and while gazing longingly at you with her big, blue eyes, she reveals, [nyan.speechNoEffects(That was the m-most fun I've had in a long time. I don't ever go out or do anything while my m-mum's not in town, you see... T-Thank you, [pc.name]...)]

Although it was no more than a short walk, your time together seems to have had a significant impact on the typically-nervous cat-girl's demeanour, and as you respond to her thanks, she suddenly does something very uncharacteristic of her. Still gazing into your [pc.eyes], your girlfriend steps forwards, and with her [nyan.breastSize], [nyan.cupSize]-cup breasts rising and falling as she pants with excitement, she leans forwards and allows her [nyan.lips+] to part a little.

Knowing that this opportunity will only last a few seconds, you quickly decide whether or not to take things to the next level with your shy girlfriend...
